title: April 5, 2025
textContent:
---vacation time!---

I just want to thank you bby for joining our family getaway again! This is really how we bond as a family ever since dati pa. Byahero talaga kami AHAHAHAHA. So I really appreciate you bby for always coming kahit na alam kong fav hobby mo mag rot in bed AHAHAHAHAH MWAAA!

I also want to thank you kase g na g ka lang lagi pag dating samin. I really appreciate your efforts and I'm also really happy to see na nag eenjoy ka rin like me! Vacation whenever my father comes home has always been fun. But its even more fun now that I get to spend it with you!

Tapos thank you rin bby lagi for always taking pics of us during our vacations! Pakak na pakak mga pics!! Ang gaganda!! Hehehe. Tapos pinopost mo pako lagi! Huhuhu I'm so lucky that you're always proud of me, kase I am proud of you too! I want the whole world to know how happy and lucky I am because I have a pretty, sexy, funny, and kind bunion bby! MWAAA I LOVE YOU!!
